output:
Map {
Visual Arts and Design {
    User Story 1: As a user, I want to be able to view a list of all the visual arts and design projects I have created.
    User Story 2: As a user, I want to be able to select a project and view its details.
    User Story 3: As a user, I want to be able to add new projects to my list.
    User Story 4: As a user, I want to be able to edit existing projects.
    User Story 5: As a user, I want to be able to delete projects from my list.
    User Story 6: As a user, I want to be able to upload images and videos to my projects.
    User Story 7: As a user, I want to be able to share my projects with other users.
    User Story 8: As a user, I want to be able to view the projects of other users.
    User Story 9: As a user, I want to be able to comment on other users' projects.
    User Story 10: As a user, I want to be able to rate other users' projects.
    }
}
